means: 重建( rebuild的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The castle was rebuilt by his great grandson in 1859.
sentence.Network_cn: 城堡在1859年由他的曾孙重建。

sentence.Network_en: The interiors were disembowelled and rebuilt.
The bridge was rebuilt in two halves.
sentence.Network_cn: 该桥被分成两部分进行重建。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...胞。视锥细胞中的视色素(visual pigments)在吸收光线时会被破坏，因此视网膜要持续感光，视色素就需要不断地重建(rebuilt)和再生(recycled)，当吸收光线后，视色素上的发色团(chromophore)从视锥细胞转移到.
we must have this house rebuilt ., 我们必须找人重修这所房子.

list.abs: How much is a rebuilt engine ?, 翻修引擎要多少钱?
Last year we had the house rebuilt ., 去年 , 我们把房子翻修了.
He says Haiti ' s children also need schools rebuilt and basic social services ., 他说海地的孩子们同样需要学校的重建以及基本的社会服务.
rebreathing device 循环呼吸器rebuilt valve 复原阀reburn 复燃

entry.def: When people rebuild something such as a building or a city, they build it again after it has been damaged or destroyed.

example.ex: They say they will stay to rebuild their homes rather than retreat to refugee camps...
example.tran: 他们说他们将留下重建家园而不是躲到难民营里。

example.ex: The castle was rebuilt by his great grandson in 1859.
example.tran: 城堡在1859年由他的曾孙重建。

entry.tran: 重建，重组，复原（机构、制度或生活的某些方面）
entry.def: When people rebuild something such as an institution, a system, or an aspect of their lives, they take action to bring it back to its previous condition.

example.ex: Everyone would have to work hard together to rebuild the economy...
example.tran: 所有人都应该一起努力以重建经济。

example.ex: Jane began to rebuild her social life which had been non-existent since her marriage...
example.tran: 简开始重新建立自己自结婚以来便陷于沉寂的社交生活。

entry.tran: 复原，修复（身体某一部分）
entry.def: If doctors rebuild part of someone's body that has been damaged, they operate on that person to make them well again.

example.ex: Two weeks later, surgeons carried out the operation to rebuild his face.
example.tran: 两周后，外科医生实施了手术以复原他的面部。

auth_sentence.content: To the south, a rebuilt water tower rises.
auth_sentence.res_content: To the south, a rebuilt water tower rises.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To the south, a rebuilt water tower rises.

auth_sentence.content: He has also rebuilt the relationship with his sons.
auth_sentence.res_content: He has also rebuilt the relationship with his sons.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He has also rebuilt the relationship with his sons.

auth_sentence.content: It was never rebuilt and only the foundations remain.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was never rebuilt and only the foundations remain.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was never rebuilt and only the foundations remain.
